summary: I JUST BOUGHT VEHICLE USED IN NOVEMBER WITH 13K ON IT.  THE TRUNK LATCH WAS THE FIRST THING THAT WASN'T WORKING RIGHT.  IT WOUDN'T WORK UNLESS I SHUT IT REALLY HARD.  THE SPLIT REAR SEAT DOESN'T LATCH EITHER.  NOW AFTER15K MILES AND  THREE MONTHS HAVE PASSED AND I KEEP LOOSING BRAKE FLUID.  I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER AND A TECH FOUND THAT THE CLUTCH MASTER CYLINDER IS LEAKING FLUID.  I WONDER IF THAT IS WHY MY CLUTCH IS SLIPPING?
